title: Inferno

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select an Underworld member and a doused player, teleporting visits to the latter.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All visitors to the target Underworld member are, without their knowledge, redirected to the doused player.
- Anyone who's visit would have produced a notification to the Underworld member will become doused.
- You may redirect 4 times.
- If the Apocalypse is dead and there are no Underworld Offensive roles alive, you will become the Apocalypase.

desc:
Post 356
*Your hands reach across this earth, so that the flames may follow. You hope they thank you.*
Roleblock Immune
Control Immune
Conversion Immune
